statements: SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, status FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE currency = 'USD' AND status = 'completed';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM payment_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM payments
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 100
SELECT transaction_id, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payer_id, payee_id FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 5
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount < 500
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payee_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY payee_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT p.payment_id, t.total_amount FROM payments p INNER JOIN transactions t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id;
SELECT DISTINCT payer_id FROM payments;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT amount, description FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, timestamp FROM payments WHERE description ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM payments WHERE payer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type IN ('debit', 'credit') ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT payee_id FROM payments WHERE amount >= 5000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE public_key = 'abcd1234';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM user_details ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM payment_methods WHERE method_id > 2;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_address FROM user_details ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM payment_methods WHERE method_id = 1;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_details FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_time FROM orders ORDER BY order_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT users.username, orders.quantity, payments.amount FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
